function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of unbiased data affecting AI model performance","Impact":"Reduced accuracy of COVID-19 diagnosis, leading to misdiagnosis or missed cases","Mitigation":"Collect diverse and representative data, apply data augmentation techniques, and validate model performance across different demographic groups.","Technologies":"Data augmentation, federated learning, differential privacy","People":"AI model developers, data scientists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"AI model developers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Potential contamination of medical equipment during use of medical imaging techniques","Impact":"Risk of spreading COVID-19 to healthcare workers and patients","Mitigation":"Implement strict disinfection protocols for medical equipment, use disposable protective covers for equipment, and minimize contact with contaminated surfaces.","Technologies":"Automated disinfection systems, disposable protective covers, contactless imaging techniques","People":"Healthcare workers, medical equipment manufacturers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, medical equipment manufacturers"},{"Description":"Acceleration of testing kit development using AI","Impact":"Rapid approval and deployment of testing kits without adequate validation or quality control","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough validation and quality control of testing kits, ensure regulatory approval from authoritative bodies, and monitor testing kit performance in real-world conditions.","Technologies":"Quality control algorithms, real-time monitoring systems, regulatory compliance software","People":"Medical researchers, regulatory authorities, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Medical research institutions, regulatory authorities"}]}
